projects.Title: Contest Tracker
projects.Description: Contest Tracker is a web application designed for competitive programmers to stay updated on upcoming contests from platforms like Codeforces, CodeChef, and LeetCode. The app allows users to filter contests based on difficulty levels, platform, and dates. Additionally, users can bookmark contests, set reminders, and view past contests to analyze their performance.
Features: Fetches contests from Codeforces, CodeChef, LeetCode, and more
Filters contests based on difficulty, duration, and platform
Set reminders for upcoming contests
Bookmark contests for quick access
Track past contests with performance insights

projects.Title: QuestSearch
projects.Description: QuestSearch is an AI-powered search engine that fetches relevant results from multiple sources, integrating intelligent ranking and recommendation systems. It enhances user experience with auto-suggestions, personalized search, and result filtering based on AI-driven insights. Ideal for users looking for quick and optimized search experiences across various categories.
Features: AI-powered search with auto-suggestions
Fetches results from multiple platforms with optimized ranking
Filters search results based on user preferences
Personalized recommendations using machine learning
Fast and efficient search with minimal latency

projects.Title: SociaLink
projects.Description: SociaLink is a social media aggregator that allows users to view posts and updates from multiple social media platforms in a single, streamlined dashboard. The app offers advanced filtering, sorting, and content curation, ensuring users can customize their feeds based on relevance and interests. Designed to reduce social media clutter and provide a unified experience.
Features: Integrates multiple social media platforms (Twitter, Reddit, etc.)
Consolidated feed for real-time updates
Customizable feed preferences with filters
User authentication for personalized experience
Dark mode support for improved UI experience

projects.Title: Smart Voice
projects.Description: Smart Voice is an AI-powered voice assistant that enables users to interact with their devices using speech recognition. It supports multiple commands like setting reminders, fetching the latest news, answering general queries, and even automating daily tasks. The app is designed with a natural language processing (NLP) engine to enhance user interaction.
Features: Speech recognition powered by AI
Voice-controlled commands for hands-free interaction
Fetches news, weather updates, and general information
Can set reminders and manage daily tasks
Supports multiple languages and accents

projects.Title: Food Recipe App
projects.Description: The Food Recipe App is a user-friendly application that allows users to explore, save, and share their favorite recipes. The app provides a vast collection of recipes with detailed instructions, ingredient lists, and step-by-step guides. Users can also submit their own recipes, store favorites, and search for dishes based on available ingredients.
Features: Search recipes by ingredients, cuisine, and meal type
Save and manage favorite recipes in local storage
User-submitted recipes with approval system
Step-by-step cooking instructions with images
Dark mode support for better user experience

projects.Title: AI-Powered Lead Management System
projects.Description: The AI-Powered Lead Management System is designed to help businesses track, score, and engage with leads efficiently. It automates lead capture, assigns scores based on user interactions, and triggers marketing actions accordingly. The system also provides an admin dashboard to manage leads and view analytics. With AI-based scoring and automated follow-ups, businesses can enhance their conversion rates and optimize sales workflows.
Features: Lead capturing and deduplication
AI-based lead scoring system
Automated email and WhatsApp follow-ups based on lead scores
Admin dashboard for managing and tracking leads
Authentication system for secure user access
LocalStorage-based tracking for user interactions
Integration with OpenAI for AI-driven recommendations
Role-based access control for different user types
